item.title: Report X-2024101521
item.description:
Report X-2024101521

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-25T09:22:20+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-11
  • City: RONKONKOMA
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On 10/11/2024 at approximately 1730, Dangerous Goods Administration received a call from Employee 966383 and the station location in Ronkonkoma, reporting a dangerous goods spill. The shipment is a large cylinder. The shipment was reported to have fallen from the sort belt and began to make a "hissing" sound, indicating that the cylinder was releasing pressure. After evaluation, the shipment was isolated from people and other freight until completely depressurized. The shipment is being for customer pick-up.

item.title: Report X-2024101340

Report X-2024101340

  • City: SYRACUSE
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: The package appeared to have been repacked into a plastic bag without following proper procedures for an undeclared hazmat and the external bag had a hazmat diamond label.

item.title: Report I-2024100129
item.description:
Report I-2024100129

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-24T09:29:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-15
  • City: Long Island City
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: DHL EXPRESS (USA), INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On 10/15/2024 hidden dangerous goods were discovered during the shipment inspection process at the DHL Express LIC facility, located at 12-12 33rd Avenue, Long Island City, NY 11106. Transportation by road has been confirmed. Shipment also contains UN1266 Perfumery products UN1944 Matches, safety Class 3 Class 4.1 Single Package or Inner Packaging(if any): Single Package or Inner Packaging(if any): Packaging Type: Bottle Packaging Type: Box Material ofConstruction: Glass Material of Construction: Fiberboard Package Capacity: 100 mL Package Capacity: 10 g Amount in Package: 100 mL Amount in Package: 10 g Number in Shipment 1 Number in Shipment.
